https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fEHObAiSDCjg8eZdlZfK8IuHJF2.jpg Bernard Bottle, a mild mannered art buyer, is fired by his greedy boss, abandoned by his girlfriend and discovers a genie in an old bottle. The genie immediately embraces the modern world and helps Bernard on the side. Bernard and the Genie
